sqlMap.sql: ID, BUSINESSFLAG, AUTOSYNCFLAG, PROJECTID, DDTYPE, TRANSDATE, TRANSREASON, PURPOSE, MEMO, USERCODE, STAFFAPP, AMOUNT, BKTRANSTYPECODE, SKTRANSTYPECODE, FEETYPECODE, TAXTYPECODE, CUSTOMID, ACCOUNTID, OPBANKACNTNO, OPBANKNAME, OPBANKACNTNAME, OPBANKPROVINCE, OPBANKCITY, REPAYTYPEID, APPUSERCODE, PERSONNEL, PROJECT, CUSTOMER, CASHFLOW, VIRTUALACCOUNT, CONTRACTNUMBER, STOCKCODE, FUNDACCOUNT, SALESDEPARTMENT, CHECKNUMBER, BUSINESSTYPE, CASHFLOWSTATEMENT, TAXCATEGORY, INTERESTRATE, INDUSTRY, STOCK, ASSETNAME, PRODUCTNAME, CLIENTORBENEFICIARY, SHAREHOLDER, ENTRUSTCONTRACTNUMBER, TRADINGPURPOSE, CONTRACTVARIETY, DATEOFRECEIPT, INTERESTDATE, DUEDATE, INOROUT, BILLNUMBER, WS_STS, TX_TIME, SD_TIME, TRANSID, WORKFLOWSTATE, REMARKS
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ALLOCATE_REG_WS_IN( ID, BUSINESSFLAG, AUTOSYNCFLAG, PROJECTID, DDTYPE, TRANSDATE, TRANSREASON, PURPOSE, MEMO, USERCODE, STAFFAPP, AMOUNT, BKTRANSTYPECODE, SKTRANSTYPECODE, FEETYPECODE, TAXTYPECODE, CUSTOMID, ACCOUNTID, OPBANKACNTNO, OPBANKNAME, OPBANKACNTNAME, OPBANKPROVINCE, OPBANKCITY, REPAYTYPEID, APPUSERCODE, PERSONNEL, PROJECT, CUSTOMER, CASHFLOW, VIRTUALACCOUNT, CONTRACTNUMBER, STOCKCODE, FUNDACCOUNT, SALESDEPARTMENT, CHECKNUMBER, BUSINESSTYPE, CASHFLOWSTATEMENT, TAXCATEGORY, INTERESTRATE, INDUSTRY, STOCK, ASSETNAME, PRODUCTNAME, CLIENTORBENEFICIARY, SHAREHOLDER, ENTRUSTCONTRACTNUMBER, TRADINGPURPOSE, CONTRACTVARIETY, DATEOFRECEIPT, INTERESTDATE, DUEDATE, INOROUT, BILLNUMBER, TX_TIME )VALUES( #id#, #businessflag#, #autoSyncFlag#, #projectid#, #ddtype#, #transdate#, #transreason#, #purpose#, #memo#, #userCode#, #staffapp#, #amount#, #bktranstypecode#, #sktranstypecode#, #feetypecode#, #taxtypecode#, #customid#, #accountid#, #opbankacntno#, #opbankname#, #opbankacntname#, #opbankprovince#, #opbankcity#, #repaytypeid#, #appusercode#, #personnel#, #project#, #customer#, #cashflow#, #virtualaccount#, #contractnumber#, #stockcode#, #fundaccount#, #salesdepartment#, #checknumber#, #businesstype#, #cashflowstatement#, #taxcategory#, #interestrate#, #industry#, #stock#, #assetname#, #productname#, #clientorbeneficiary#, #shareholder#, #entrustcontractnumber#, #tradingpurpose#, #contractvariety#, #dateofreceipt#, #interestdate#, #duedate#, #inorout#, #billnumber#, FUN_SYSTIME )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ALLOCATE_REG_WS_IN set BUSINESSFLAG=#businessflag#, AUTOSYNCFLAG=#autoSyncFlag#, PROJECTID=#projectid#, DDTYPE=#ddtype#, TRANSDATE=#transdate#, TRANSREASON=#transreason#, PURPOSE=#purpose#, MEMO=#memo#, USERCODE=#userCode#, STAFFAPP=#staffapp#, AMOUNT=#amount#, BKTRANSTYPECODE=#bktranstypecode#, SKTRANSTYPECODE=#sktranstypecode#, FEETYPECODE=#feetypecode#, TAXTYPECODE=#taxtypecode#, CUSTOMID=#customid#, ACCOUNTID=#accountid#, OPBANKACNTNO=#opbankacntno#, OPBANKNAME=#opbankname#, OPBANKACNTNAME=#opbankacntname#, OPBANKPROVINCE=#opbankprovince#, OPBANKCITY=#opbankcity#, REPAYTYPEID=#repaytypeid#, APPUSERCODE=#appusercode#, PERSONNEL=#personnel#, PROJECT=#project#, CUSTOMER=#customer#, CASHFLOW=#cashflow#, VIRTUALACCOUNT=#virtualaccount#, CONTRACTNUMBER=#contractnumber#, STOCKCODE=#stockcode#, FUNDACCOUNT=#fundaccount#, SALESDEPARTMENT=#salesdepartment#, CHECKNUMBER=#checknumber#, BUSINESSTYPE=#businesstype#, CASHFLOWSTATEMENT=#cashflowstatement#, TAXCATEGORY=#taxcategory#, INTERESTRATE=#interestrate#, INDUSTRY=#industry#, STOCK=#stock#, ASSETNAME=#assetname#, PRODUCTNAME=#productname#, CLIENTORBENEFICIARY=#clientorbeneficiary#, SHAREHOLDER=#shareholder#, ENTRUSTCONTRACTNUMBER=#entrustcontractnumber#, TRADINGPURPOSE=#tradingpurpose#, CONTRACTVARIETY=#contractvariety#, DATEOFRECEIPT=#dateofreceipt#, INTERESTDATE=#interestdate#, DUEDATE=#duedate#, INOROUT=#inorout#, BILLNUMBER=#billnumber#, WS_STS=#wssts#, SD_TIME=#sdtime#, TRANSID=#transid#, REMARKS=#remarks# WHERE ID = #id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ALLOCATE_WS_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS id FROM DUAL

SELECT
FROM ( SELECT m.*, rownum as rnum FROM (SELECT
FROM ALLOCATE_REG_WS_IN
) m ) WHERE rnum >= #startNum# AND rnum <#endNum#
